April 15, 1978 D Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section C)
Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section C) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest huddersfield-district-bba-spring-contest-3672
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40 and trophy, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 7 bands competed.
Sept. 10, 2013, 12:52 p.m. June 22, 2016, 10:26 a.m.
